maqras.text: Yakhana ‘isa tadera theke kuphari upalabdhi karalena takhana tini balalena, ‘allah‌ra pathe kara amara sahayyakari [1]?’ Ha'oyarigana [2] balala, ‘amara'i allah‌ra sahayyakari. Amara allah‌te imana enechi. Ara apani saksi thakuna ye, niscaya amara musalima
‘He amara raba! Apani ya nayila karechena tara prati amara imana enechi ebam amara e rasulera anusarana karechi. Kaje'i amaderake saksyadanakaridera talikabhukta kare nina.’
Ara tara kutakausala karechila, allah‌o kausala karechilena; ara allah‌ sresthatama kausali

Smarana karuna, yakhana allah‌ balalena, ‘he ‘isa! Niscaya ami apanake parigrahana karaba [1], amara nikata apanake uthiye niba [2] ebam yara kuphari kare tadera madhya theke apanake pabitra karaba. Ara apanara anusariganake keyamata paryanta pradhan'ya diba, tarapara amara kache'i tomadera pratyabartana. ’ Atahpara ye bisaye tomadera matantara ghateche ami tomadera madhye ta mimansa kare deba
Tarapara yara kuphari kareche ami taderake duniya o akherate kathora sasti pradana karaba ebam tadera kono sahayyakari ne'i
Ara yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche tini tadera pratiphala puropuribhabe pradana karabena. Ara allah‌ yalemaderake pachanda karena na
Eta amara apanara nikata tela'oyata karachi ayatasamuha o hekamatapurna bani theke
Niscaya allah‌ra nikata ‘isara drstanta adamera drstantasadrsa. Tini take mati theke srsti karechilena; tarapara take balechilena, ‘ha'o’, phale tini haye yana
(Eta) apanara rabera nikata theke satya, kaje'i apani sandehakaridera antarbhukta habena na

Atahpara apanara nikata jnana asara para ye ke'u e bisaye apanara sathe tarka kare take baluna, ‘esa, amara ahabana kari amadera putraderake o tomadera putraderake, amadera nariderake o tomadera nariderake, amadera nijederake o tomadera nijederake, tarapara amara mubahala (binita prarthana) kari, atahpara mithyabadidera upara de'i allah‌ra la’nata [1].’
Niscaya egulo satya bibarana ebam allah‌ chara an'ya kono haka ilah‌ ne'i. Ara niscaya allah‌, tini to parama parakramasali, prajnamaya
Atahpara yadi tara mukha phiriye neya, tabe niscaya'i allah‌ phasadakaridera samparke samyaka abagata

Apani baluna. ‘He ah‌le kitabagana! Esa se kathaya ya amadera o tomadera madhye eka'i; yena amara ekamatra allah‌ chara karo ibadata na kari, tamra sathe kono kichuke sarika na kari ebam amadera ke'u allah‌ chara eke an'yake raba hisebe grahana na kari. ’ Tarapara yadi tara mukha phiriye neya tahale tomara bala, tomara saksi thaka ye, niscaya amara musalima [1].’
He ah‌le kitabagana! Ib‌rahima sambandhe kena tomara tarka kara, athaca ta'orata o injila to tara pare'i nayila hayechila? Sutaram tomara ki bujha na

sabadhana, tomara to se saba loka, ye bisaye tomadera saman'ya jnana ache se bisaye tomara tarka karecha, tabe ye bisaye tomadera kono jnana ne'i se bisaye kena tarka karacha? Ara allah‌ janena ebam tomara jana na
Ib‌rahima iyahudi'o chilena na, nasara'o chilena na; baram tini chilena ekanistha musalima ebam tini musarikadera antarbhukta chilena na
Niscaya manusera madhye tara'i ib‌rahimera ghanisthatama yara tara anusarana kareche ebam e nabi o yara imana eneche; ara allah‌ muminadera abhibhabaka
Kitabidera ekadala caya yena tomaderake bipathagami karate pare, athaca tara nijederake'i bipathagami kare. Ara tara upalabdhi kare na
He kitabira! Tomara kena allah‌ra ayatasamuhera sathe kuphari kara, yakhana tomara'i saksya bahana kara
he kitabira! Tomara kena satyake mithyara sathe misrita kara [1] ebam satya gopana kara, yakhana tomara jana
ara kitabidera ekadala balala, ‘yara imana eneche tadera prati ya nayila hayeche tomara dinera surute tate imana ana ebam dinera sese kuphari kara; yate tara phire ase

Ara ye tomadera dinera anusarana kare taderake chara ara ka'uke'o bisbasa karo na [1].’ Baluna, ‘niscaya allah‌ra nirdesita patha'i ekamatra patha. Eta e jan'ye ye tomaderake ya deya hayeche anurupa ara ka'uke'o deya habe athaba tomadera rabera samane tara tomadera sathe bitarka karabe [2].’ Baluna, ‘niscaya anugraha allah‌ra hate; tini yake icche ta pradana karena. Ara allah‌ pracuryamaya, sarbajna.’
Tini sbiya anugrahera jan'ya yake icche ekanta kare beche nena [1]. Ara allah‌ maha anugrahasila
